Hi [recipient],

 

With finals approaching and move-out day on the horizon, it's time to plan ahead. Let Storage Scholars take the hassle out of storing and shipping your belongings so you can focus on what matters: final exams, hanging with friends, and maybe, just maybe that last spring party ;) 

Here‚Äôs How We Streamline Your Move-Out ‚¨áÔ∏è


We Supply

We supply all the essentials to pack and safely store all your items.


We Pick Up

A fellow student will come to grab your things at a convenient time for you!


We Deliver

When you are ready to return to campus, we will have your items delivered for the start of the semester!


We Ship

We can ship boxes home for the summer, or to your first apartment a few months after graduation (optional).

A recommendation for every occasion
Whether you‚Äôve tried every place in town or don‚Äôt know where to begin, OpenTable can help inspire your next dinner decision. Browse our Most Booked list to find your next reservation. Get personalized recommendations and discover the best dining options for every mood, craving, and occasion‚Äîall with a few taps. Download the app

Set your sights on Hong Kong. Three nonstop flights per day make it easy to explore this legendary city.
 
Spend your days wandering among Hong Kong's high-rises to discover hidden gems on every block, from delectable street food to bustling markets and more along every shore.

Head off to Hong Kong with ease from the West Coast with United: Choose between 2 nonstop flights per day from San Francisco (SFO), or daily nonstop service from Los Angeles (LAX).

URGENT: Your Account Security Compromised! Dear Customer,We regret to inform you that we have detected suspicious activity on your account. Your security may be compromised, and immediate action is required to prevent unauthorized access. Please click the link below to verify your account details and secure your account.Click here to verify your account: [phishingsite.com]Failure to act may result in the suspension of your account. We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.Sincerely,
The Security Team

Meeting Reminder: Quarterly Sales Review Hi Team,Just a friendly reminder that our quarterly sales review meeting is scheduled for tomorrow at 10:00 AM in Conference Room A. We'll be discussing our performance over the past quarter and setting goals for the upcoming months. Please make sure to come prepared with any relevant reports or updates. Looking forward to a productive meeting! Best regards,
[Your Name]

Confirmation: Your Flight Booking"Dear [Your Name],Thank you for booking your flight with AirTravel.com! We're excited to confirm your reservation for the following itinerary:
Flight: ABC123
Date: May 1, 2024
Departure: City A at 10:00 AM
Arrival: City B at 12:00 PM
Please find attached your e-ticket for reference. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact our customer service team.Safe travels!Regards,
AirTravel.com Team

You and a guest will enjoy a luxurious 5-star resort stay in your dream destination. To claim your prize, simply click the link below and fill out a short survey.Claim your prize now: [spammylink.com] Hurry, this offer expires soon!Regards,
The Prize Patrol Team

Invitation: Charity Fundraiser Event Hi [Name],We hope this email finds you well. We're excited to invite you to our upcoming charity fundraiser event in support of [Charity Name]. Join us for an evening of live music, delicious food, and inspiring stories of impact. Your attendance will help us make a difference in the lives of those in need. Date: Saturday, May 5th, 2024
Time: 6:00 PM onwards
Venue: [Venue Name] Please RSVP by [RSVP Date] to secure your spot. We look forward to seeing you there! Warm regards,
[Your Name]

Important: Upcoming Maintenance Schedule"Dear Valued Customer,We want to inform you about an upcoming maintenance schedule for our online platform. To ensure optimal performance and reliability, we will be conducting maintenance on [Date] from [Start Time] to [End Time]. During this period, access to certain features may be temporarily unavailable.We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact our support team.Thank you for your continued support.Sincerely,
[Company Name] Team

The Watch Emporium Team

We'll be discussing project updates, upcoming deadlines, and any challenges we're facing. Please come prepared with any relevant updates or questions.Looking forward to our productive discussion!Regards,

Your Recent Purchase Confirmation Dear [Customer Name],Thank you for your recent purchase with [Company Name]. We're pleased to confirm your order details:
Order Number: [Order Number]
Date: [Date of Purchase]
Items: [List of Purchased Items]
Total Amount: [Total Amount]
Your order is currently being processed and will be shipped shortly. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact our customer support team. Regards, Team

Invitation: Company BBQ Picnic Hi Everyone,It's time for our annual company BBQ picnic! Join us for an afternoon of food, games, and fun at [Location] on [Date]. Families and friends are welcome to attend. Please RSVP by [RSVP Date] so we can ensure we have enough food and beverages for everyone.We hope to see you all there!Best regards,
The Company Events Team

Important Update: Changes to Company Policies Dear Team,We want to inform you about some important updates to our company policies. These changes affect [specific policy or policies], and we encourage you to review the updated policy document attached to this email. If you have any questions or need clarification on any points, please don't hesitate to reach out to HR.Thank you for your attention to this matter.Regards,
[Your Name or HR Department]

Thank You for Your Recent Donation

Dear [Donor's Name],

On behalf of [Organization Name], we want to express our heartfelt gratitude for your recent donation. Your generosity is helping us make a meaningful difference in the lives of those we serve. With your support, we can continue our mission to [briefly describe the organization's mission or cause].

Your contribution of [Amount Donated] will directly fund [specific program, initiative, or project]. We are truly grateful for your commitment to our cause.

If you have any questions or would like to learn more about how your donation is making an impact, please feel free to reach out to us at any time.

Once again, thank you for your kindness and generosity. Together, we can create positive change in our community.

Warm regards,
[Your Name]
[Organization Name] Team
